description:
Season: 19
Original Air Date: 12/06/2005

Bridget believes that Felicia still has feelings for Nick and that is why she was so emotional at their baby shower.  Everyone wonders about Felicia’s health.  Eric hatches a plan In order to regain control of Forrester Creations and tries to convince Brooke that it will work.
